name: kawa.i18n
description: Internationalization extension for Kawa Code - translates code identifiers between languages

scripts.build:macos: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js -t node18-macos-x64 -o binaries/i18n-service
scripts.build:windows: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js -t node18-win-x64 -o binaries/i18n-service.exe
scripts.build:linux: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js -t node18-linux-x64 -o binaries/i18n-service
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:roundtrip && npm run test:comprehensive

author: Kawa Code
